episodes.title: Joan Is Awful
episodes.plot: An average woman is stunned to discover a global streaming platform has launched a prestige TV drama adaptation of her life - in which she is portrayed by Hollywood A-lister Salma Hayek.

episodes.title: Loch Henry
episodes.plot: A young couple travel to a sleepy Scottish town to start work on a genteel nature documentary - but find themselves drawn to a juicy local story involving shocking events of the past.

episodes.title: Beyond the Sea
episodes.plot: In an alternative 1969, two men on a perilous high-tech mission wrestle with the consequences of an unimaginable tragedy.

episodes.title: Mazey Day
episodes.plot: A troubled starlet is dogged by invasive paparazzi while dealing with the consequences of a hit-and-run incident.

episodes.title: Demon 79
episodes.plot: Northern England, 1979. A meek sales assistant is told she must commit terrible acts to prevent disaster.
